thread.title: Portland City Council overturns exoneration of police officer who hit bicyclist with stun gun six times
thread.title_full: Portland City Council overturns exoneration of police officer who hit bicyclist with stun gun six times

author: Jessica Floum | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland City Council overturns exoneration of police officer who hit bicyclist with stun gun six times
text: In September 2014, a Portland Police officer deployed a Taser on a Portland bicyclist six times within 15 seconds in a use of force that drew years of scrutiny and conflicting opinions on whether Officer Bradley Nutting's actions were appropriate.
